website_summaries.verdict: Quality, variety, and features earn this set the top spot on our shortlist.
pros: Boasts durable, non-stick carbon steel construction and convenient silicone handles
Attractive brown finish compliments kitchen decor
cons: It's on the high end of the price range, but you get a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to get this new cookware
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this new cookware! I loved the look of it and the color! Less than 2 years later I'm dealing with rusted pans that actually stained my brand new kitchen sink! So do not buy if you plan to actually use them!
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They rust! They have zero scratches on them but when you wash them the water stand behind the folds around the rims and rusts.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Good pans horrible warranty company.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are very nice and good quality. One bad thing was our 9 inch pan had two deep scratches in it so in stead of returning it we filed a warranty claim and that’s were the good part ends. The company sent us a faberware replacement pan instead of the Rachael Ray pan. They also are very hard to contact because they make you file a claim every time. I still may return it because it took a month to get the wrong pan who knows how long to get the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colors and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty bakeware set, the color is perfect and so easy to clean! You can dishwasher these, I haven't had an issue this far, but of course recommend to handwashing to preserve the quality for years to come. When you do handwash, everything just glides off.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: I love Rachael Ray cookwear
customer_reviews.text: I love Rachael Ray cookwear. I don't understand the problems people have with the silicone melting, your oven temp must be way off. These are the most non stick surface I have ever used. And they are heavy duty. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not put in the oven! It will melt the blue parts away!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love Rachel Ray products and was super stoked when we remodeled our kitchen to get a new set of Rachel Ray pots and pans. My last set lasted us years with no problems! This pan set when in oven once, yup just once and the blue part on the pan melted! Yup it melted! What a terrible product! Im so sad to not be able to have all a matching set and now im scared to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: waynett k iokepa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love them. These pans are so easy to clean up and work wonderfully. There is a limit on how hot you can cook with these so be sure to read that before you buy. I have not had any problems out of this set. Got it for Christmas and they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this set and live the colors
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a good quality baking set and I'm so happy I went with this one. All 4 pieces are great quality and I love that they match my kitchen colors. They washed up very easily by hand washing and food slides tight off them and doesn't stick. My only complaint is that I wish the muffin tin was a 12 holder pan. Overall, I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ten7blonde

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift last year , my old pans are better than this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BDT

customer_reviews.title: Average bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bake where, used the cake pans twice and it already has permanent burnt marks from food sticking to it. Rust settles in underneath the handles after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pans!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Rachael Ray collection pot and pans. We bought one of her skillet's at Christmas and now have this whole collection. Oven and dishwasher safe! Instructions say hand washing is recommended, but IS dishwasher safe. Oven safe to 450.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Wall

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made started sticking after 3 times of cooking. Dont waste your money pls like we did.
customer_reviews.author: labs123

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! So Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These are replacing a high end set I was forced to leave! I like these Better! They fit my hands, they are light weight and have great functionality! The color is pleasing as well. I also bought her Cookware! Both are a true joy to me! Worth every penny. In fact, I would have paid double and been just as happy!
customer_reviews.author: Josie from USA

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are tough on kitchen utensils and cookware. I purchased this set as a backup to my other set just like it, which I have used for one year now on a weekly basis, with no problems or concern. I like the color and functionality of Rachel Rays kitchen line. I recommend not using any metal on this, for obvious reasons to avoid stretching off the non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Definately best money I spent on pans!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set and used to cook Thanksgiving dinner. I was very surprised with the quality for the money. Arrived nicely packaged, heavy but not too heavy. I cooked everything, nothing was overdone, underdone, and I really appreciated the hot burner portion built in (was easier to grab out of the oven and not burn myself). The food did not stick. I also put in dishwasher, and every pan was clean, nothing damaged. Definately better than T Fal and other expensive brands I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: This bakeware set is perfect & I’m glad I received them before the holidays. I’ve used them a couple of times to roast veggies & make banana nut bread. Everything came out of the oven perfect & they are easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Sad sad day
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this bake set! We have had them for about 3 months. However, we used the baking sheet today for the first time and it buckled!!! This is our first time using this sheet and we are soo disappointed that it got torqued. We are baking salmon at 350 degrees so we shouldn't have had any problems. Has anyone else had this problem? We are wondering if we just got a faulty sheet since all the other sheets in the set work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about ordering these, but I love them! Truely nonstick and easy to clean. No rust. They have help up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking
customer_reviews.text: Love mine! The only bake-ware you will ever need. Its sturdy, cleans easily, has handles & my baked breads come out perfect & cookies/brownies come right off its surface. Washes well too. It cost more than I wanted to spend but its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: NAB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but they do scratched easy as heck
customer_reviews.text: I have the pan set in mushroom and wanted a nice baking set. They work great but everything but plastic or bamboo scratches them. Not sure how long they will hold up but no rusting just yet.
customer_reviews.author: emilee

customer_reviews.title: Pan warped during first use :(
customer_reviews.text: Received this beautiful set last Friday and decided to make some baked chicken breasts. About 3min after putting it in at 450F, I heard this loud "POP" and saw that one of the cookie sheets had warped in the oven. On the product page, the set was marketed as "Oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit"...lol what a disappointment. Amazon customer service was quick and helpful in initiating a replacement. Considering the fact that the other cookie sheet survived the entire 20min, I'll give the bakeware one more chance.
customer_reviews.author: YX

customer_reviews.title: I really like these.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this collection and want some more. I love the durability of them, and they even clean well in the dishwasher. I even like how deep the regular baking sheet is. I made a homemade square pizza on it and it actually was perfect for it. So far, all is good. I also particularly like the color of it as it is not just a gray/aluminum color. And the blue silicone handle parts is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Wife says they work great
customer_reviews.text: After I ruined my wife's old set of pans with burnt BBQ she seems to like these a lot more anyway so it's a win win since she has a new set and I can keep the old set to continue using with my BBQ. haha
customer_reviews.author: bwl

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I purchased ours a few months ago and it's still in pristine condition! Very easy to clean and most of the time I just put it in the dishwasher! The whole set has held up very well. I wish there was a way to purchase separate matching pieces. I really need two cupcake pans and not one, bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used every one during the holidays. Worked very well. RR may clame to be a bad baker but she makes good products for it. They are slippery so hold on tight when using taking out or puttng away. There is a sugestion not to stack so I keep them in the bags they came in. Also they suggest not using the dishwasher to clean up, but the nonstick surface makes clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: sundowner

customer_reviews.title: Get very easily scratch and rusty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set some time ago, and i am looking for a new set because they got scratched easily and rusty very rusty. If you put them on the dishwasher they get rusty faster!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: BEST PANS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the best pans ever. Food slides right off with no spray or butter. They are super easy to clean and look nice! Worth every penny and now I want to replace all my pans with these. I have put them in the dishwasher on the top rack with no problems, but they are easy enough to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: My Name Is

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the coin
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase. Cleaning instructions state that its best not to put in a dishwasher. No issue there, but these are worthless. I used the cookie sheet to bake cookies. Slightly greased the pan and when done the butter had charred the pan. These are nice to loon at but def not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: For years, a lifetime of housekeeping, I have bought and replaced bakeware. No matter how they were care for, they rusted. And rusted badly. I am incredibly impressed with this collection of Rachel Ray's 10-piece bakeware. Incredibly impressed! I tossed out all of my former baking pans. All of them! This will make an excellent shower gift for every new homemaker. There are not enough stars to give an adequate rating to my new collection! Trust me!
customer_reviews.author: firelady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best nonstick cookware set of ever used I had recently purchased the entire Oxo professional non-stick stuff with the ripples in it and it's garbage it's non stick to a certain point and you bake anything that's got sugar in it my cookies and you have stains on your cookie sheet that won't come off and it starts ticking
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's not fancy premium quality but it does the job. I did not have any scratches yet although I'm quite careful with cookware in overall. No rust or stains like others stated. I made lasagna many times in them and it always cleans off perfectly in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Mattia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean and Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Great collection of different sizes and purposes, which is what I was looking for. These are extremely easy to clean since they are nonstick. I've only baked a few times so can't speak to how long these will last. I love the plastic cover that clicks in place over the deep dish pan, I've used this the most, even for carrying barbecued meat from an outdoor grill to inside the house. Very easy to pop off the cover.
customer_reviews.author: jttb

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the $$
customer_reviews.text: We've had them about 3 months now and so far, so good. They seem to be holding up and I'm pleased with that, as we've spent more money on other sets not half as good as these. I will update the review if I have any problems in the next few months, but for now, I really, really like this set!
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Knapke

customer_reviews.title: I loves the color of the set. Unfortunately I ...
customer_reviews.text: I loves the color of the set. Unfortunately I will be sending back. After using just once, the baking tray no longer sits flat.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy and pleased. Work awesomely. Would deffinatley buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Stains fast and stays. Bleh.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality but it really does stain quickly and hard to remove once on. I’ve made do with it because I really needed a new one and the set is cute. I just use foil mostly but still there are dark stains everywhere, like some buyers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Chong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pans!
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost daily. They hold up well and are truly nonstick. Wife has made cookies on them and the slide right off, even the ones with melted chocolate! Easy to hand wash and they cool down quickly so clean up doesn’t have to wait.
customer_reviews.author: StarWarsNut

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After baking ONE time, the cookie imprints stained the surface. I scrubbed and scrubbed at it and it would not come out. I just got them yesterday, I haven’t tried out the other bakeware. But so far, not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bolmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Best bake set ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bakes that I’ve ever had. It’s substantial and heavy and wait beautifully finished works well and cleans great I look forward to many years of using this set!
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Food tastes much better once I decided to upgrade and pitch my rust ridden set!
customer_reviews.author: IA shopper

customer_reviews.title: handles burnt in the oven
customer_reviews.text: The handles burnt first time I put in the broiler.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sue

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good pack but the cupcake pan has the seen where the cupcakes go so when you over fill or fill regularly it all get caught in there and you need a tooth pick to get out of those cracks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 pc bakeware set awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I like that on the handles there is a silicone type grip so you aren't just grabbing metal. I washed them when I first got them but have not used them. This is a great deal for the sale price. I have other Rachel Ray cookware and have been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ Rachel ray
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Had purchased the cookware set so needed bakeware to match.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Really nonstick!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bakeware! We purchased these along with the matching cookware. I love that they don’t stain which I was worried about given the lighter color. These are truly nonstick and clean up easily. Great product and arrived packaged nice and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: Rachael Ray cookware is quality cook cookware
customer_reviews.text: My bakeware from Rachael Ray cookware works well is beautiful and cleanse easy as durable it's not cheaper doesn't scratch real easy and sometimes you got to drop something like a four-top from another pot in your pan by mistake and it scratches it these didn't
customer_reviews.author: Bargain lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: highly recommended- love this set. Remember note below and absolutely NO metal utensils. Son & daughter-in-law love this gift as well. Very nice pieces. Good quality feel to them as well. Recommend read the pamphlet - as you need to wash before use and cannot use in dishwasher. Really like the set. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever!
customer_reviews.text: Really great pans. Absolutely nothing sticks. They are so easy to clean. You don’t have to scrub them clean because everything falls right off. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TVM

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, JUNK, JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: First time in the oven the pan warped and twisted! Nothing but JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So good we ordered my parents a set for Christmas! Love these sooooo much!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Marie Kim

customer_reviews.title: satified with purchase
customer_reviews.text: love these pans, they are so easy to clean and the grips on them help a lot with not losing the pan out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean-up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to bake and find this bakery set suits my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M. Wren

customer_reviews.title: Lovin RR
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter who bakes alot and she absolutely loves it..what a great price for all included..RR products rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIFE CHANGING.
customer_reviews.text: Ive never been able to get a cake out of a pan in one piece until now. I finally made my first two layer cake and it was epic. Thank you Rachael. Also made egg muffins and had the same thrilling experience
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful line
customer_reviews.text: Love the Rachael line. Will be back for more. Easy to clean ♡
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Smith Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The Teflon coating is soooooo smooth
customer_reviews.text: Food just slides off the pan onto the plate! cooks evenly and cleans up perfectly; the outside of the pan and bottom of the pan also are easy to clean so the pans always look brand new! Two thumbs up for this product. No more grocery store cookware for me! totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Cooking w/ this cookware makes me actually want to cook for some reason ... i love the touch of red got the matching cookware and soon some more of her stuff. The only thing i don’t like is when i wash it it draining brown not a lot
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to clean. Nonstick for sure. I still use Pan spray for baking but my regular cooking such as meats I don’t use any type or butter or spray and the food doesn’t stick at all. They seem like this will last for a long time. Best Buy yet. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: RamosVR

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The cookware is falling apart. Not happy with my purchase. The plating of the cookware is wearing off on most on the baking pans. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LISE BOHM

customer_reviews.title: very heavy nice quaility
customer_reviews.text: as I have not used these yet I can tell just by the feel and weight they are gonna be strong a long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Justice

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second Rachel Ray purchase, after getting the cookware set and using them for a year I loved them so much that I got the bakeware set. They are perfect, I would recommend these to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: nick kibler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these pans! Super easy to clean, nothing sticks, very affordable, great quality and they’re even prettier in person. Only downside I have found is that you can’t wash them in the dishwasher, but that’s a non issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The first time using the sheet pan it left marks where the rolls were that will not come off! Then the rim's where the handles are at the top hold water and are rusting. I've only maybe used the one pan twice! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bakeware set!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!!!! Had on my wedding registry but decided to get a set early and obsessed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Came scratched
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with the purchase but I did recieve a cookie sheet that came with 2 big scratches in it upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Baking Sheets WILL Buckle
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love these pans, however I’m on my second set and below 400 degrees they keep buckling. So far 3 of the large baking sheets (the ones I use the most!) have all warped. Amazon was very quick to replace the first set so I praise them but if you want a sturdy baking set this is not for you. The other pans looks great and for the price, well I guess like most things you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These pans are simply amazing! They are super easy to clean, never ever needing to be scrubbed. They are nice to look at as well. My only regret is that I didn't get them a long time ago. They are truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Novak

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pans I have ever had! No rust and cooks evenly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible baking set! Things seem to bake a bit faster, which is wonderful. Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have a physical problem and this bakeware cleans so easy that I don't have to worry about my legs going out from under me. This bakeware is worth it's money and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Carola Marx

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. SUUUPPEERR easy to clean. Impressed my roommates. She cooks a lot and noticed that the grime from baking stuff in the oven comes off nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ABlazier

customer_reviews.title: replacement of old units
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift therefore I did not use it myself. But my granddaughter says she loved it and used it right away and work good.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Baking sheets loosing paint and non stick after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: After two uses of making chocolate chip cookies the baking sheets have heavy discoloration on them and then one of them even has the paint and nonstick layer peeling off! The plans usually hold up but with this being a Christmas present and they are already ruined is truly unfortunate. They are only hand washed as well so it's not like they were abused in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Brosseau

customer_reviews.title: All I need for basic oven experience
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect basic set. I use it to bake literally everything in my favorite menu.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The pans quickly lost their nonstick quality with frequent use and then became difficult to clean. I originally purchased due to reviews and the Rachel Ray name. I was hoping to have a set of bakeware that would last years but I have already had to start replacing some of them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great bake set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bakeware! Don’t hesitate with this purchase you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hunker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for almost two years. They are so easy to hand wash. I liked the so much I purchased them for my brother and sister in law for a Christmas present when they were looking for a set. I will continue to order products like this from Rachel Ray!
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They don’t bend while in the oven and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: This baking set arrived yesterday in a super thick super glued box
customer_reviews.text: This baking set arrived yesterday in a super thick super glued box. No way to crush the contents. Immediately impressed with the heavy quality and looks like they will really be stick proof and last a long time before the stickless stuff scratched or wears off. Nice colors. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-ard

customer_reviews.title: Pan set
customer_reviews.text: Really like using these pans. Wash up nicely in dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and sturdy bakeware. Love the plastic cover on the 9x13. The load pan is also great and has made some great banana bread! The silicone covers on the handle are also helpful to handle hot bakeware.
customer_reviews.author: E. Euting

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it is rachael ray, what more is there to say? This is a second set for my mother. Nothing wrong with the first, she just wanted more pans. I have a set myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughters first apartment. She’s loved them and uses them all the time!! Iv been over for dinner several times and she says they are great to cook with and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: April Irving

customer_reviews.title: Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift for a friend's daughter. She received it when expected and though I haven't heard from her, her mother thanked me for the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget B.Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far, easy to clean and have maintained coating and color. Pans cook evenly as well and have not warped like cheaper cookie sheets.
customer_reviews.author: JCobb

customer_reviews.title: Great product! No burning at all
customer_reviews.text: Got the set the other day, already made banana bread, it’s fantastic, easy to clean, nothing is burned, no idea what ppl are making that they’re experiencing these burning from reviews... it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are high quality and a very pretty color. They cook everything evenly and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with these pans and so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Warped in oven.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, but the few times I have used them, they seem to warp in the over. Once they are taken out, they go back to flat. Easy to clean. They work for what i use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I thought this was going to be a worthwhile purchase. I washed the cupcake pan after a first use and it rusted around each indent's perimeter. That is really lame to charge this much for a product that is obviously not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest S.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Set - Love them - Nest GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this set - I purchase the matching cupcake pan separately. That is the only thing I wish for - that it would be included. My 2nd time around. Purchased this set to match colors in my new home :)
customer_reviews.author: Irysh

customer_reviews.title: I got it from warehouse deal, most pans had ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it from warehouse deal, most pans had dints the 2 cookies sheets were bend in half not useable. Sent back. And order I new set instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Stirn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pans, easy to clean, cooled down fast and matches my kitchen perfectly. I wanted a new set of baking pans for a while. I'm glad I decided to purchase this set.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: At first, I am very happy to get the set. However, after 2 times using I realized it is very hard to clean. I feel disappointed. Since it has the silicone piece in the handles, we cant put the tray in broil otherwise it will melt. I will look for another set. Maybe I will go with stainless steel this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, until they rust!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these pans and bakeware items.... however the money I spent on these has gone to waste. All of these pans have rusted after just a few uses and washing and hand drying. I’m SO disappointed that I will now have to find and invest in more bakeware because these have gone to waste....
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: They seem great at first. They don't clean easy. Butter burns into them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE ... have only had a day and made perfect brownies for my son !!! A warm water wash and this pan was spotless !!! Can not wait to cook this weekend !!! The sale price was unbeatable !
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Amey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! Durable! Big deep pans! Oh and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Latita Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Easiest cleaning bakeware!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bakeware I've ever had!! My pecan pie filling boiled over and burnt to the pan, I was able to use my spatula and scrap it off into the trash. It was as easy as slicing butter.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Sanders

customer_reviews.title: No stick bake. Love them
customer_reviews.text: I had some pans that I bought about 8 years ago and I bought this set for a gift and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray 52410 Cucina Nonstick Bakeware Set with Baking Pans, Baking Sheets, Cookie Sheets, Cake Pan, Muffin Pan and Bread Pan - 10 Piece, Latte Brown with Cranberry Red Grip
product_meta.description: Color:Latte Brown with Cranberry Red Grip| Size:10 Piece| Style Name:Bakeware SetThe Rachael Ray(r) Cucina Nonstick Bakeware 10 Piece Baking Pan Set is the perfect bakeware team for sweet and savory oven made treats. This nonstick bakeware is constructed from heavy gauge steel with rolled rims for everyday durability. Bake pans feature long lasting nonstick inside and out for outstanding food release with quick cleanup, and the baking pan set includes all the essential bakeware items for delish baking results. Oven safe to 450°F, the silicone grips provide a solid, comfortable grasp (even with your favorite potholders on) and add a pop of modern rustic kitchen color. Best of all this comprehensive bakeware set partners with the complete Cucina collection for even easier going kitchen style and functionality. Enjoy easy, delicious roasted and baked foods with the distinctive, durable Rachael Ray Cucina Nonstick Bakeware 10 Piece Baking Pan Set.
feature_bullets: Built to Last: This Rachael Ray bake-ware set features heavy gauge steel construction with rolled rim edges designed for easy, everyday use
Color and convenience: Nonstick baking pans feature colorful handles and long lasting, latte colored nonstick inside and out to provide excellent food release with quick cleanup
Variety and versatility: This nonstick bake-ware set includes all the essential bake pan shapes for great baking results and is oven safe to 450 degrees F
Set includes: Two 10 inch x 15 inch cookie sheets, two 9 inch round cake pans, one 9 inch square cake pan, 2 piece loaf pan, 9 inch x 13 inch covered rectangular cake pan, and a 12 cup muffin pan

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
